attributes.action: to change the law to make it illegal to protest against the armed forces
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: to show to the armed forces of great britain and ireland that the british public fully support their actions in the line of duty. i hereby petition the prime minister to make it an offence under the laws of this country to protest against the armed forces, and also that to protest in racially inciting demonstrations will also be against the law.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
